about_the_game:
About this Game:
For long darkness has ruled the continent of Granxel.After the great war against the ancient Dark lord Traxeon,Dark Energy shatteredand spread all across lands and seas,leaving tramandous amount of power items and treasures for people to explode.Unkonow Dungeons emerged and changed,Mistery Spells whispering about Evil rerise.Peace will not last forever.

Team of Bravery features Classic retro RPG game experience with action roguelike combat system.
Player will have to survive different type of dungeon areas and those who survive will unlock large amount of Rewards and treasure.
Current features include:
*5 Classes of heroes,Up to 4 team members.
*5 dungeon area. To explored.
*Max level 99.
*30 variasion of skills combinations,Offense type/Defence type
*20+ epic items to power up your Team survivability.

For long darkness has ruled the continent of Granxel.After the great war against the ancient Dark lord Traxeon,Dark Energy shatteredand spread all across lands and seas,leaving tramandous amount of power items and treasures for people to explode.Unkonow Dungeons emerged and changed,Mistery Spells whispering about Evil rerise.Peace will not last forever.

Team of Bravery features Classic retro RPG game experience with action roguelike combat system.
Player will have to survive different type of dungeon areas and those who survive will unlock large amount of Rewards and treasure.

name: Team of Bravery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7 +
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space

short_description: Team of Bravery is an action roguelike dungeon crawler Team RPG adventure game.Gather your team ,Level up your Team members and Exploring dangerous Dungeons.Survirve and Loot legendary Items and Treasure ~Fight your way out in the Greatest Adventure!
